mapper.select: SELECT o.objection_id AS objectionId, er.result_id AS resultId, e.emp_no AS empNo, e.name AS empName, DATE_FORMAT(er.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS evaluatedAt, o.reason AS objectionReason, s.status_type AS statusType, o.response AS responseReason FROM hr_objection o JOIN eval_response er ON er.result_id = o.result_id JOIN employee e ON e.emp_id = er.target_id JOIN status s ON s.status_id = o.status_id LEFT JOIN hr_weight w ON w.round_id = er.round_id LEFT JOIN hr_rate r ON r.round_id = er.round_id WHERE o.objection_id = #{objectionId}

SELECT ep.property_id AS propertyId, ep.name AS propertyName, es.score AS score FROM eval_score es JOIN eval_property ep ON ep.property_id = es.property_id WHERE es.result_id = #{resultId} ORDER BY ep.property_id
SELECT r.rate_s AS rateS, r.rate_a AS rateA, r.rate_b AS rateB, r.rate_c AS rateC, r.rate_d AS rateD FROM eval_response er JOIN hr_rate r ON r.round_id = er.round_id WHERE er.result_id = #{resultId}

SELECT w.perform_wt AS weightPerform, w.team_wt AS weightTeam, w.attitude_wt AS weightAttitude, w.growth_wt AS weightGrowth, w.engagement_wt AS weightEngagement, w.result_wt AS weightResult FROM eval_response er JOIN hr_weight w ON w.round_id = er.round_id WHERE er.result_id = #{resultId}
